message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.SY

This paper discusses methods for training Restricted Boltzmann Machines, which are commonly used in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper specifically focuses on the stochastic gradient estimate variance in Contrastive Divergence and Persistent Contrastive Divergence, which are optimization algorithms used in training these models. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), cs.CV (Computer Vision), and cs.SY (Systems and Control).
